thread.section_title: TrekEarth - South America Travel Photo Gallery
thread.title: Time to Shop

title: Time to Shop
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
The Largo da Ordem Street Fair is an open event which takes place every Sunday from 9 am to 2 pm in the Largo da Ordem, historical center of Curitiba. The first editions took place in 1973 basically made up of members of the hippie community. There are currently many exhibitors and artisans, also increasing the number of tourists, making the fair one of Curitiba attractions. The Fair occupies several streets and here we were in front of the Parana Memorial. 
Nobody has marked this note useful
